lines.text: If there's one thing that mothers don't want to see in you it's whatever it is that their daughters do.
The best first impressions are the ones that are misleading. I mean, you can be whoever you want and whoever they want you to be.
I notice you don't have a drink.
Certainly not. Parties of this kind are not given, they're received.
Well, that's crap. Who's ever got time to act natural with a girl?
You spend 15-20 minutes trying not to come and then when you do you have to give a pretty credible performance.
